title: Magic Guild Store (Mystic Robes)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Magic Guild Store is located on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the Wizards' Guild. One must have a Magic level of 66 to enter the guild. The store is owned by Wizard Sinina. He sells blue mystic robes. He also sells the Magic skillcape to players who have achieved 99 Magic.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Magic Guild Store (Mystic Robes)
Magic Guild Store
Released23 October 2002 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationWizards' Guild
OwnerWizard Sinina
SpecialtyMagic shop
Location

The Magic Guild Store is located on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the Wizards' Guild. One must have a Magic level of 66 to enter the guild. The store is owned by Wizard Sinina. He sells blue mystic robes. He also sells the Magic skillcape to players who have achieved 99 Magic.

Stock[edit | edit source]

Sells at: 100.0% • Buys at: 60.0% • Change per: 0.1%

in stock		Restock
time		Price
sold at		Price
bought at		GE
price
Mystic hat10001m 15,000 9,000 15,189
Mystic robe top10001m 120,000 72,000 71,620
Mystic robe bottom10001m 80,000 48,000 47,679
Mystic gloves10001m 10,000 6,000 5,425
Mystic boots10001m 10,000 6,000 5,544

Magic cape[edit | edit source]

If a player has 99 Magic, they will have access to a duplicate version of the shop, with the only difference being the addition of the Magic cape. The stock of this shop is not shared with the regular shop.

ItemNumber
in stock		Restock
time		Price
sold at		Price
bought at		GE
price
Magic cape10.6s 99,000N/ANot sold

Magic cape(t)[edit | edit source]

For players with 99 Magic and at least one other 99, they will access a second duplicate shop. Just like the previous, the stock of this shop is not shared with the others.

time		Price
sold at		Price
bought at		GE
